name: Hydro Flask Wine Bottle 740ml
description: Perfect temperature vino to go. Unbreakable, insulated, and crafted from stainless steel, Hydro Flask’s Wine Bottle helps you get your favourite vintage from A-to-B without breakage or the introduction of a plastic-y taste.Non-slip silicone base helps prevent slippage.Designed to fit a whole standard bottle of wine.Pure Pour™ opening reduces drips and cleans easily.TempShield™ double wall insulated technology keeps your drinks cold for up to 24 hours, hot for up to 6 hours, and won’t sweat on you.18/8 food grade stainless steel is the benchmark steel of the high-end culinary world.Cap has honeycomb insulation helping keep your drink the right temperature.Dimensions: 7 x 19.5cm.
